properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 5:21PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Big Haynes Creek near Milstead affecting Newton and Rockdale
Counties

Little Haynes Creek near Milstead affecting Newton and Rockdale
Counties


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Little Haynes Creek near Milstead.
* From this afternoon until further notice.
* At 445 PM Thursday the stage was 9.6 feet, and rising.
* Flood stage is 10 feet.
* At 10 feet, minor flooding begins in the woodlands and fields along
the creek upstream and downstream from the gage on Dial Mill Road.
Some low lying portions of residential backyards on River Ridge
Trail will begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
